mapper.select: SELECT i.ioid,i.oid,u.username,u.realname,rc.cname,i.start,i.end,i.days,i.status AS i_status,o.price FROM internetorder i LEFT JOIN orders o ON i.oid=o.oid LEFT JOIN user u ON i.uid=u.uid LEFT JOIN room_cate rc ON rc.cid=i.rcate where rid=0 OR rid="" OR rid=null limit #{offset},#{limit}
